h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location
content: The Horse Guai can be found at the Furnace Valley, Valley Entrance area of the Flaming Mountains. However, you will need to kill the Keeper of Flaming Mountains") boss towards the end of the chapter before you can do anything here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Dark_Thunder.md', within the main section titled 'Dark Thunder', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location' and the sub-subsection 'Horse Guai Flaming Mountains Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Horse Guai can be found at the Furnace Valley, Valley Entrance area of the Flaming Mountains. However, you will need to kill the Keeper of Flaming Mountains") boss towards the end of the chapter before you can do anything here.
